### About
As an individual, I bring a strong skill set in technologies related to Web and iOS development. Apart from utilizing several programming languages, I have experience working with version control, network calls, APIâ€™s, third-party libraries, frameworks, relational databases, multithreading, and an MVC & MVVM design pattern. I can adapt to a fluid and dynamic development environment - comfortable working with any computer/mobile OS and can transfer my skillset to any programming language or technology that is required.

> Good design adds value faster than it adds cost. -- Thomas C. Gale
